keywords: ['yodel/folkmusic', 'e-bass', 'piano', 'acoustic drums', 'yodeling', 'high register voice', 'guitar', 'mood elevating', 'medium to uptempo']
caption: The e-bass is playing an almost walking line along with a guitar playing a melody on top. The acoustic drums are playing a constant rhythm along with a piano playing one chord on the offbeat. The yodeling voice sings in a higher pitch and sounds amused. This song may be playing at a local folk festival.
